resources.string: I agree to OneScore\'s Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
I agree to Terms of use and Privacy Policy of OneScore and CIBIL

"I agree to OneScore\'s Terms of Use and Privacy Policy authorise to communicate via SMS, Email WhatsApp. I hereby request for a copy of my Credit Information and/or aggregates on my registered email id or through my OneScore account, and authorise Experian and CIBIL to also provide the same to FPL Technologies Private Limited, on my behalf.
